img_above_text:
![Mountain-Shaking Claw.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/8/82/Mountain-Shaking_Claw.jpg)
To obtain the Mountain-Shaking Claw, you need to defeat Cyan Loong in Bitter Lake in Turtle Island in The New West. This boss requires you to have the Loong Scales.
img_below_text: For even more guides and tips on finding all the items in the game, be sure to check out our guide on all the Black Myth: Wukong Weapons locations and Armor and Gear locations, as well as the Gourds, Curios, Vessels, and Transformation Spells locations. You can also find a library of all the Medicine Ingredients and Consumable Items in the game.
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Mountain-Shaking Claw.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/8/82/Mountain-Shaking_Claw.jpg)
To obtain the Mountain-Shaking Claw, you need to defeat Cyan Loong in Bitter Lake in Turtle Island in The New West. This boss requires you to have the Loong Scales."
        - Following Text: "For even more guides and tips on finding all the items in the game, be sure to check out our guide on all the Black Myth: Wukong Weapons locations and Armor and Gear locations, as well as the Gourds, Curios, Vessels, and Transformation Spells locations. You can also find a library of all the Medicine Ingredients and Consumable Items in the game."

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a boss fight against Cyan Loong in *Black Myth: Wukong*. The player character is engaged in combat in a snowy, stormy environment, with visible health and ability icons on the screen. This battle is essential for obtaining the Mountain-Shaking Claw, a weapon that requires defeating Cyan Loong in Bitter Lake on Turtle Island. The preceding and following text highlights this encounter as part of a broader guide to finding items, weapons, and gear in the game.
